sense.gloss: effort, exertion, endeavour, endeavor, hard work, striving
to endeavor (to do), to endeavour, to try hard, to work hard, to strive, to make an effort, to exert oneself, to devote oneself, to be committed (to doing)
third principle of the Eight Principles of Yong, downward stroke
as much as possible, as far as possible, to the best of one's ability, diligently
prize awarded for good effort, consolation prize
self-help efforts, independent efforts, self-supporting endeavor

sdata.j: ↑努力↑↓どりょく↓なくしては↑何↑↓なに↓も↑得↑↓え↓られない。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑禁煙↑↓きんえん↓するよう↑努力↑↓どりょく↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You should make an effort to stop smoking.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑英語↑↓えいご↓を↑習得↑↓しゅうとく↓するために↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓↑努力↑↓どりょく↓しさえすればよい。
sdata.e: All you have to do is try hard to master English.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓に↑努力↑↓どりょく↓しさえすればよい。
sdata.e: You only have to try hard.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はあまり↑努力↑↓どりょく↓しない。
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑努力↑↓どりょく↓はもうじき↑実↑↓みの↓るだろう。
sdata.e: Your efforts will soon pay off.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑努力↑↓どりょく↓はきっと↑成功↑↓せいこう↓をおさめるだろう。
sdata.e: I'm sure your efforts will result in success.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑努力↑↓どりょく↓はいつの↑日↑↓ひ↓か↑君↑↓きみ↓のためになるでしょう。
sdata.e: Your efforts will pay off one day.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑努力↑↓どりょく↓はいつかは↑実↑↓み↓を↑結↑↓むす↓ぶだろう。
sdata.e: Your efforts will bear fruit someday.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑努力↑↓どりょく↓はいずれ↑報↑↓むく↓われるだろう。
sdata.e: Your effort will be rewarded in the long run.

words.gloss: effort, exertion, endeavour, endeavor, hard work, striving
to endeavor (to do), to endeavour, to try hard, to work hard, to strive, to make an effort, to exert oneself, to devote oneself, to be committed (to doing)
